title: Family Fracas
description: A new game show that makes people do weird stuff and then dumps foam on them. Families compete in physical challenges for the chance to win big prizes (or more foam).
altHero: host Chuck Charles with two families on a colorful game show set
alt1: two sets of mothers and daughters use giant spoons to remove flies from giant bowls of soup
alt2: two men hang from harnesses with their heads submerged in a blue ball pit
alt3: foam cam showing two people getting covered in orange foam
alt4: contestant Louise Belcher screams in frustration next to a wheel of prizes
